name: Grandma's House (kciampitti)
description:
After your Grandma's passing, you're tasked with cleaning out her house. While you're there you can poke around a bi and see if she had any secrets in her life.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This is the final revision of this game for my Fall semester 2022 narrative game class

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls

- click and hold to inspect objects 

- click and drag to move some objects
